div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die mensis
aprilis Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo primo

The saide day Androu Cullane tuk to preyve that the iiij li' and x s' follouit
be Alexander byssat was pait with his consent to george Kinge in northt beruyk for him
and allegit his preuys was beyond' fortht And' the aldirman and ballieis
assignit the secund' day of June next to Cum to the said Androw to preyve
his said' allegeance befor the aldirman and balyeis in the court of the saide burghe
to be haldin within the tolbutht of the samyn the said' day And to bring ane
Sufficient acquitance of pament of the said' Some fra the said' george that It
was pait to him be the saide androw for the said' Alexander

The said' day Alexander bysset Solemptlie protestit for his Costis skathtis dampnis
and expensis in the said' matir

add.foreign: Johannes mar balliuus et Johannes Wilyongson

div.p:
The said' day Jonhne of mar balye grantit that he causit Johne Wilyongson'
to depart with his geir' to alexander bysset and that he sald' caus' him be
freid' tharof

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiij die Aprilis
Anno quo Supra

the said' day the balyeis assignit friday the last day of aprile Instant
to Alexander menyeis and Dauy menyes to warne the Auditouris chosin vpon'
the aldirmannis cownt to Comper' within the tolbutht to sueyr' and tak
the said' covnt to thame sa mony as thai mycht
comphend' comprehend'

The said' day patr patry richertsone grantit that he hed' ane litill
Siluer knyff of thomas meldrumis quhilk the balyeis chargit him
to deliuer to the said' thomas

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvj die
aprilis Anno quo Supra

The said' day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to alexander menyes
that thai suld' ger' warne the tone to provide and cheis' ane mastir of Sanct
nicholes werk conuenient tharto at the plesour of the tone

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem allanj Williamson' fratris quondam Donaldj sclatar
div.p:
Johannes Cullane Alexander chamer Jacobus Colison' Willelmus blinsell thomas Waus
Waus Jacobus Srathachin malcolmus crag Johannes tuliboy gilbertus
litstar Willelmus murray Willelmus vmfray Dauid fynne et thomas buchane
burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Allanus William Donaldus Williamson'
frater Alanj Williamsone latoris presencium Obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut
de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de quadam terra Jacente
Infra dictum burgum in vico viridi inter terram quondam Andree mureson'
ex orientali et terram alexandri hovat ex occidentali et terram Jacobi Kennertj versus
austrum et Communionem viam regiam versus boriam Et de vno annuo Redditu
de dicta terra prefati alexandri houat Et quod dictus alanus
est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam Donaldi fratris suj de dictis terra et
annuo Redditu Cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc
per annum sex s' et octo d' et valuit v s' tempore pacis Et quod dicta terra et
annuus Redditus tenentur in Capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgagium Et nunc existunt In manibus domini nostri Regis per decessum dicti quondam
Donaldi fratris suj per Spacium sex mensium aut eocirca in defectu verj
heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis datum et clausum sub Sigillo
thome leslie vnius balliuorum dicti burgi ac Sigillis quorundam qui huic
Inquisicionj Intererant faciend' Anno die mense et loco prenotatis

The said' day the balyes assignit friday that next cumis to Dauy colp
to minster him Justice Anent the airschip clamit of vmquhile Johne
huchoson' and ordanit him to gif the gudis that he clames and the namys
of the personis withhaldaris of the Samyn that thar mycht be warnit
to the said' day

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vltimo die mensis Aprilis Anno Quingentesimo primo

The said day Alexander Red was Chosin master of the kirkwerk
for ane yer' Inmediatly to be Runnyn and the Adirman Aldirman ballies consale
and communite dischargit and quiet'clamit the said Alexander his ayris executouris
ane assignez' of ale the gudis and the said kirkwerk and ale enteres'
that he had tharwitht for thame thar successouris ayris executouris and
assignez' now and foreuire and ordanis to gif him ane acquitance tharof
vnder thar commone seile and the said Alexander sall Intromet with the said
kirkwerk and Rewle It be his conscience and dischargit him his ayris executouris
and assignez' of the said yeris compt now and foreuire and of al yeris
and termes bigan et cetera

The said day the haile towne consentit that makyne burnat and
Jonet Litster sall haue enteres' in thar avine hous' within the towne'
ande Riman' in the sammyn xxtj dais and forthir at the townis will
And Androw burnat come souerte be his hand land and gudis for x merkis
to sanct nicholes werk gif the said makyne happinnis to do ony
skath to the towne throue hir Interin And Richerd litstar come souerte
in likwis' for the said Jonet to sanct Nicholes' werk And that
nane sal cum In without leif of the aldirman and the towne vnder
the pains of banyssing of the tovne for yer and day and that na geir be
brocht out of futy within the towne vnto the tyme it be sene be the officiaris
that thai be clengit

add.foreign: Caucionarij Jacobi colison' et thome lammynton'

div.p:
The saide day the ballieis at commavnd' of the consal lousit the arrest
of the skinnis to James Colisone and thomas lammyntone ande the saide James
fand' his handis landis and gudis Souerte / for his part of the said' Skinnis
tile ale party complenyeand' hauand' enteres' tharto And' the said'
thomas fand' Jonhne of Kyntor Souerte for him for his part of the
said' skinnis to be Responsal tile al party complenyeand' havand' Interes'
tharto And' the saide thomas oblist him be his hande landis and gudis to
releyve the said Johne of his said' borrovgane quhilk skinnis perteni
was arrestit at the clame of Dauy colp and the actornais and procuratouris of
Jonhne Smyth

the saide day Jok of Scrogis grantit him feit seruand' to William
blinsele Coupar tile the fest of Candilmes next to Cum he payand'
him his fee

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo
die mensis Maij Anno Domini quingentesimo primo

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod Agnes lundoris
est legittima et propinquior heres quondam Richardi lundoris patris suj

The said day the baillies assignit friday that nixt cumis to the lard
of Essilmond one the tapart and Jhon' of meldrum one that vthir
to bring thar assedacionis of the land quhar the said Jhon' duellis in
befor thame that It may be vndirstand quhedir the said' Jhon' has
Rycht to the said land or nocht

The said day Jhon' of callat grantit he Ressauit that he Ress sex
barrellis of salmond of Robert blinselis merkit with his mark as
he did fra vthir merchandis

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod Thomas
Wricht est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam mathej Wricht
patris suj

Eodem die Archebaldus Rait de Drumtoctj fecit constituit et
creauit dominum Johannem stirueling suum procuratorem ad
petandum exon et Recipiendum summam quatuor librarum a preposito
ballivis consules et communitate sibi debit' de terminis elapsis
Promitten' se Ratum gratum et ad acquitancias dandum

The saide day the ballieis assignit friday that next cumis to Dauid colp
for minstracioun of Justice and ordanit him to gif the namys of the personis that
he is conplanteous' one and the gudis that he askis in writ tile ane officiar'
to warne thame to comper the said' day befor thame for minstracion of Justice
eftir the tenor' of our Souerane lordis lettres direttit tharapone

add.foreign: Assignacio Abbatj et priorj de bonacord'

div.p:
The said' day the balyeis consale and communite of the tone assignit
to Jonhne of mar' and Dauid mar' abbat and priour' of bonacord'
Sex merkis of the malys of the gardin and four' merkis of the malis
of Schethoysley to be rasit at thar' avne handis at the termes
vsuale within the saide burghe' for thar' gude and solacious' seruice
to be done Anent the saide office of bonacord' for this Instant
yer eftir the ald' louabill consuetud' of the said' burghe quhilkis
x merkis was grantit and assignit to tham one may day last bigan
at the woman hill quhen thai war' now chosin in office last

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiijo die
mensis maij Anno quo supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod Willelmus
Andersone est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Willelmi andersone senioris
patris suj

Eodem die dominus Alexander egistone capellanus in medio produxit quidem prothogollum
Instrumenti subscripcione domini Johannis hyrdman orij penes assedacionem terre Johannis
Andirson' assedate matri sue de dicta xxiiij die Octobris Anno Domini Mo
Nonagesimo nono

The said' day Jonhne meldrum offerit him redy to vndirly the decisioun' of
ane assis' Anent the tak of the hous' that he duellis in clamit be Johne
chene of essilmond'

The said' day sere Alexander Ogistone In the name of the lard' of essilmond' chargit
Johne of meldrum to Red' the said' hous' that he Occupeis

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die mensis
maij Anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo primo

add.foreign: Electio commissariorum ad assedacionem generalem faciendum

div.p:
The said' day the balyeis Consale and communite warnit be the
hand'bell and the Officiaris of the tone be oppin premunucioun
gathtreyt ande Inquerit be thomas leslie and Williame
Wormet tua balyeis grantit and consentit to set al thar' fischingis
wattiris and landis to the nichtbouris and Induellaris of this burghe'
for fyve yeris eftir the vigile of Sanct Androw last bigane
And' chesit thir personis sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' aldirman Alexander
menyes Robert blinsel Dauid menyes Alexander chamer Alexander Rede and Jonhne
Wormet thar' commissaris to Set thar' saide fischingis and
landis quhilkis personis was Suorne the gret aithez
to Set the samyn for the common' profit and for the bigin
of thar' queir' and reforming of thar kirk Ande ordanit
thar' ane commission' vndir thar' common sele to begevin
to thame in dew forme Apone the quhilkis the aldirman
askit Instrument befor the hale communite

The saide day Richerd' litstar Schew that Jonet litstar and makin
burnat hed' Remanit xx dais within thar hous' at the command'
of the tone

head.add: Copia commissionis pro generali assedacione huius burgi

div.p:
Vniuersis et Singulis ad quorum Noticiam presentes littere peruenerint burgenses et communitatis
burgi de abirdene eternam in Domino salutem noueritis nos matura auisiacione prehabita
vtilitate nostra in hac parte debite preuisa et diligenter considerata Et notant' pro constructione
et edificacione chorj nostre ecclesie parrochialis ac reformacione eiusdem aliisque cause
racionalibus animos nostros monen' fecisse constituisse et ordinasse necnon tenore
presencium facere constituere et ordinare nostros comburgenses predictos Johannem ruthirfurd' militem
ac prepositum nostrum Alexandrum menyes Robertum blinsel Dauid menyes Alexandrum chamer Alexandrum
Rede et Johannem Wormet nostros veros legittimos et indubitatos commissarios actores
factores et deputatos speciales dan' et conceden' eisdem et eorum maiorj
partj nostrarum plenam potestatem et mandatum Speciale omnes et Singulas
piscarias nostras libertati dicti burgi scriptan' tam aque de De que de Done
terras nostras redditus et posiciones vniuersas nobis pertinen' seu iuste spectare
valen' assedand' arrendand' et ad firmas dimittend' vicinis nostris infra
dictum burgum commorantibus pro terminis quinque annorum a vigilia Sancti Andree apostoli
datam presencium Inmediate preceden' plenarie complendorum Ac omnia alia et Singula
Circa dictam assedacionem necessaria gerend' et excercend' que nos facere possemus
in premissis si presenter personaliter Interessemus ac si que fuit que mandatum exigant
maius speciale Ratum gratum haben' et habiturum totum et quicquid dicti nostri
commissarij seu maior pars eorundem in premissis et premissorum quolibet nomine nostri
Juste duxerint aut duxerit faciend' sub ypotheca et obligacione omnium bonorum nostrorum
mobilium et immobilium presencium et futurorum In quorum omnium et Singulorum fidem et testimonium Sigillum
nomini communione presentibus est Appensum apud dictum burgum Decimonono die mensis
maij Anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo primo

The said' day the aldirman Counsal and communite ordanit the tane half
of thar' commone seile to be gevin to Alexander menyes and Alexander rede
in keping and to be vndir twa lokis Ilkan of thame havand' ane
key And' the tothir half of thar' commone sele to be gevin to Robert
blinsel and Jonhne Wormet in kepin to be put vndir tua lokis Ilkan
of thame havand' ane key and to sel na writis tharwith quhile thai
be Red' to the haill tone

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die maij
quo Supra

The saide day the commission' gevin to the commissaris to set the
watteris and fischingis for v yeris was opinly rede In presence
of the haill tone warnit be the hand'bell of the quhilkis
the tone was content ale in ane voce concording and ordanit
the keparis of the commone Sele to seile the saide commission'
with thar' commone Sele excipe Jonhne of Cullane

The saide day the ballieis assignit monunday that next cumis to
William scherar' litstar to ansuer to the borghe strekit one be peter
mallert franchman for the wranguis' haldin fra him of lxxxviij
crovnis withoutin ony dilatouris

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die
maij anno quo Supra

div.head: Inquisicio margarete fechat
div.p:
Thomas fyf Johannes Wormet Willelmus blinsele Patricius leslie Johannes blak
Andreas murray thomas Waus Johannes Kintor Willelmus nicholson' Alexander malison'
Johannes thomsone Dauid arrot et Johannes tulibo burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt
quod nescuint aliquas terras neque annuos Redditus In quibus quondam marioria
fechat soror margarete fechat latricis presencium Obiit vltimo vestita seu sasita
Et dicunt quod dicta margareta non est legittima et propinquior heres dicte quondam
mariorie quia sunt alij heredes secum eiusdem mariorie Et dicunt quod dicta
margareta est legittime etatis datum et clausum et cetera

the xxvij day of maij the yer forsaid' gilbert Wellis Oblist him
be the fatht of his body to content and pay to Johne Colison'
burges of this burghe his ayris executouris or assignez' ix barrellis of
Salmond' and j barrell of girls' gude and Sufficient merchand' gude
betuix this and the terme of lammes next to Cum for his demi nethis
fischingis of the Raik for this Instant yer' the saide Jonhne
payand the maile tharof and frething the saide gilbert his ayris
executouris and assignez' of al clames and personis that pretendis tham to haue
enteres' tharto but fraude or' gill
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxviij die maij quo Supra

the saide day Williame Scherar' litstar with his forspekaris James Colison'
and mastir Johne badenaghe' offerit him redy to vndirly Justice in the actioun
debatabile betuix him and peter mallert franchman Anent Certane wad' et cetera
and tuk to preyve that the said' peter promittit that the said' wad' suld' be of the fynast
of that price And' the balye assignit to morne to bath the said' partiis for minstracion of
Justice
